mapper.select: SELECT u.username AS username, u.name AS name, r.roles_name AS job, cs.Class_name AS className FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN `classschedule` cs ON u.classId = cs.Class_id LEFT JOIN `roles` r ON u.roles = r.roles_id WHERE u.classId = #{classId} -- 将 '目标班级名称' 替换为具体的班级名称 ORDER BY u.username ASC;
